Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This offer represents a strategic opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, ensuring both efficiency and cost-effectiveness in your endeavors. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
